testcase.name: Send a contact email
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Send a contact email When I send a contact email with subject "Inquiry" and message "I need help with my order." ... passed in 0.008s Then I should receive a "200" status ... passed in 0.000s And I should see a confirmation message "Correo enviado exitosamente" ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
